DIALOGUE BEFORE: SmallBertha: Remember who's given us a new chance to take back our island.
RESPONSE TEXT: I owe my very life to the stranger. We should listen now.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Mitch: My uncle's safe and alive. The stranger's always steered us right.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: DLC03MaleAndreMichaud: The doctor has said in time, I will fully recover.
RESPONSE TEXT: He says this is your doing? But... I do not know you.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: I was just doing my civic duty.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: I was just doing my civic duty.
RESPONSE TEXT: *dry chuckle* You're obviously not from here. Gratitude... It's a hard thing out here. So, yeah.
DIALOGUE AFTER: AndreMichaud: This island... It... it has taken my husband. It has taken everything.
SCRIPT NOTES: Reflexive chuckle, someone reeling emotionally / Sad

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: I was hoping to get something on the back end for patching you up.
RESPONSE TEXT: Of course. They did not find much on me, but you're welcome to it.
DIALOGUE AFTER: AndreMichaud: This island... It... it has taken my husband. It has taken everything.

RESPONSE TEXT: Well, I might beg to differ about that.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: No, we're strangers. Who exactly are you, anyway?
RESPONSE TEXT: Andre Michaud. With my husband John.... We hunt Mirelurks, for their meat, their shells.
SCRIPT NOTES: Tired, a little bit windy / Tired

RESPONSE TEXT: But... the last hunt did not go well.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: I was just doing my civic duty.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: No, we're strangers. Who exactly are you, anyway?
RESPONSE TEXT: As bad as it can get. A Mirelurk Hunter, he blindsided John. I managed to pull him out, but I had to run blindly. Into the Fog.
SCRIPT NOTES: Holding back tears, franticly reliving the recent trauma / Sad

RESPONSE TEXT: John was the tracker, he was the one who knows this island. But me, I got turned around.
I don't remember what happened. Someone, I don't even know who, found me... brought me here.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: I was just doing my civic duty.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: *dry chuckle* You're obviously not from here. Gratitude... It's a hard thing out here. So, yeah.
RESPONSE TEXT: This island... It... it has taken my husband. It has taken everything.
DIALOGUE AFTER: AndreMichaud: This island is a sickness. Don't you see, it's evil?

DIALOGUE BEFORE: AndreMichaud: This island... It... it has taken my husband. It has taken everything.
RESPONSE TEXT: This island is a sickness. Don't you see, it's evil?
As soon as I am well, I am going to grab as many guns as I can carry.
And I will slaughter everything in my path... Until the island is clean or I am no more.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: I wish you well, Andre.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: I wish you well, Andre.
RESPONSE TEXT: I will not go down easily, my friend.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: Way to throw your life away.
RESPONSE TEXT: I wouldn't expect a mainlander to understand. Goodbye.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: You're in pain, I've been there. But your plan is... unreasonable. Find a purpose, some constructive purpose, to keep you going.
RESPONSE TEXT: You wouldn't know... Once, Far Harbor was... well, not thriving... But alive.
SCRIPT NOTES: Really shaken by player's words, becomes clear the player has reached through his grief / Thinking

RESPONSE TEXT: I... I'll think on what you've said.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: You're in pain, I've been there. But your plan is... unreasonable. Find a purpose, some constructive purpose, to keep you going.
RESPONSE TEXT: The doctor has tried to talk me out of this, too. But I will not be dissuaded.
But now, I must rest.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: Really? That's your plan?
RESPONSE TEXT: The island wants all of us dead.
If it wants me, it can try to take me.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: I wish you well, Andre.
SCRIPT NOTES: Steeling himself for a suicide run / Defiant

RESPONSE TEXT: You are not like anyone I've ever met.
Mmm...
I was out awhile, the doctor said.
As soon as I'm able, I will find John.
He's dead... With no last goodbye.
And I am the one who still lives.
Thankful to be alive. This, is not living.
I suppose... thanks.
I will find a way to clear this debt I have with you.
John... No... No...
Must... find... Mon dieu...
*groan*
Everywhere... It's coming... Oh....
Please... No....
The doctor has said in time, I will fully recover.
DIALOGUE AFTER: AndreMichaud: He says this is your doing? But... I do not know you.
